hello friened, welcome to my site.

if you've been sent here by someone asking for information about me, would you
please sift through some of the highlighted sites

this one is about my self description, what i've worked on, and what i'm
interested in. 
https://supaiku.com/me

this one is about my anime reviews. it contains parts of my spirit that don't
come through that well through my technical writing. people seem to find it
intruiging, so i'd recommend you look there if you're / the person who asked
is interested.
https://supaiku.com/anime-reviews

and there are some of my highlight blogs, which shows my current interests
https://supaiku.com/what-does-a-lean-proof-prove
https://supaiku.com/attention-is-logarithmic
